messages.subject: Re: Unschooling Blog
messages.msgSnippet: ... about what s ... Christmas letter ... It s not just good for the relatives.  I kept a private journal last year and it was very enlightening for *me*.
messages.messageBody:
> That might be good for families whose relatives are bugging them
about what's
> going on--keep an online running record of stories. Like a
Christmas letter
> than never ends. <g>
>
> Sandra

It's not just good for the relatives. I kept a private journal last
year and it was very enlightening for *me*. After 18 years of
unschooling I took the time to look at what was happening. It's what
gave the info for the reading article.

Holly

2 COOL 4 SCHOOL
Unschooling T-Shirts
http://www.cafepress.com/2cool4school

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Blog
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/1/03 9:28:55 AM, unschooler@swbell.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/1/03 9:28:55 AM, unschooler@... writes:

<< My kids have talked me into keeping an unschooling blog. You can

follow what our family's doing throughout the year by reading along

at http://unschooler.blog-city.com/ . I have four children who are

9, 13, 14 and 18 so you can see unschooling from elementary to

adulthood.


Holly >>

That might be good for families whose relatives are bugging them about what's
going on--keep an online running record of stories. Like a Christmas letter
than never ends. <g>

Sandra

messages.subject: Unschooling Blog
messages.msgSnippet: My kids have talked me into keeping an unschooling blog.  You can follow what our family s doing throughout the year by reading along at
messages.messageBody:
My kids have talked me into keeping an unschooling blog. You can
follow what our family's doing throughout the year by reading along
at http://unschooler.blog-city.com/ . I have four children who are
9, 13, 14 and 18 so you can see unschooling from elementary to
adulthood.

Holly
2 COOL 4 SCHOOL
Unschooling T-Shirts
http://www.cafepress.com/2cool4school
